Package org.synyx.mojo.opencms

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOpenCmsMojo
    This is the abstract baseclass for all Mojos within Maven-Opencms.
    CmsShellMojo
    This MOJO starts a CmsShell (OpenCms) and executes any commands there.
    CreateModuleStructure
    Creates the module structure for an existing module.
    CreateModuleTreeMojo
    This Mojo creates a module-tree containing all files to be included in the module.
    ManifestBuilderMojo
    This Mojo creates a manifest.xml-File by delegating to ManifestBuilderTask created by Eurelis.
    ZipModuleMojo
    This Mojo creates the zip file of a previously created module tree.
